attributes.action: Make anti racism training and education compulsory in the work place and schools
attributes.additional_details: This is important not only because of the current situation going on but for the many lives negatively impacted by ignorance and lack of understanding of different cultures. In addition to the lack of consequences for the racists individuals in these institutions and establishments.
attributes.background: The government should enforce regulations To make anti racism training compulsory just as health and safety training is in the work place and ensure school have lessons and that educate them  on what is classed as racism and what causal racism is

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Add education on diversity and racism to all school curriculums: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323808

Make Anti-Racism training mandatory in all UK workplaces: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324896

We have also published several petitions about race and equality more widely, which you can view here: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions?state=open&topic=race-and-equality
